question: Analyze the social media engagement trends of companies in the technology industry over the last year.

subtasks.task: Gather the list of companies operating in the technology industry from the CompanyInfo table.
Collect Facebook engagement data (likes, comments, reposts) for the identified companies from the CompanyFacebookDetail table.
Collect Instagram engagement data (likes, comments, engagement rate) for the identified companies from the CompanyInstagramDetail table.
Collect Twitter engagement data (likes, retweets) for the identified companies from the CompanyTwitterDetail table.
Collect YouTube engagement data (likes, comments, views) for the identified companies from the CompanyYoutubeDetail table.
Analyze and compile the engagement metrics across all social media platforms to identify trends in the technology industry.
